trans-unit.source: Represents a trigger that applies property values or performs actions when the bound data meet a set of conditions.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个触发器，它会在绑定数据满足一组条件时应用属性值或执行操作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>, except that the conditions of a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> are based on property values of bound data instead of those of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>对象都类似于<xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>，只不过的条件<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>基于属性值的绑定的数据，而不是那些的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>, a condition is met when the property value of the data item matches the specified <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>，当数据项的属性值匹配指定满足某个条件<xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can then use setters or the <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A> properties to apply changes or start actions when all of the conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你可以使用 setter 或<xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A>属性来应用更改，或当满足所有条件时启动操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger.Setters%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object can only consist of <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects.

Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> child to a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.Windows.Setter>子级到<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>对象隐式将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection>为<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects are not supported; only <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> supports <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects.
For information about when to use triggers and when to use other techniques, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关何时使用触发器以及何时使用其他技术信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> is bound to `Places`, an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> of `Place` objects.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>绑定到`Places`、<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>的`Place`对象。

trans-unit.source: `Place` objects have properties `Name` and `State`.
The definition of `Place` and `Places` are not shown.
Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> displays a `Place` object.
The <xref:System.Windows.Style> in the example is applied to each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Condition> elements of the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> specify that if the `Name` and `State` of the `Place` data item are `Portland` and `OR` respectively, then the background of corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> is set to `Cyan`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Condition>元素<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>指定，如果`Name`和`State`的`Place`数据项是`Portland`和`OR`分别然后后台相应<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>设置到`Cyan`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Condition" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Condition" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Changes to property values are applied when all the conditions in the collection are met.
trans-unit.target: 在满足集合中的所有条件时应用对属性值的更改。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Condition" /> objects.
The default is an empty collection.

A <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>, except that the conditions of a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> are based on property values of bound data instead of those of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>对象都类似于<xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>，只不过的条件<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>基于属性值的绑定的数据，而不是那些的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>, a condition is met when the property value of the data item matches the specified <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>，当数据项的属性值匹配指定满足某个条件<xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>。

trans-unit.source: That value is first converted to the type of the value of the binding, if possible, and then the two values are compared using the `Object.Equals` method.
trans-unit.target: 值是第一个类型转换为的值的绑定，如果可能，，然后比较两个值是使用`Object.Equals`方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> applies the associated setters or actions when all of the conditions are true (binary `AND` operation).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>适用于关联的 setter 或操作的所有条件为 true 时 (二进制`AND`操作)。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>, each condition in the collection must set both the <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Binding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>，集合中的每个条件都必须设置同时<xref:System.Windows.Condition.Binding%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Binding%2A>.
XAML Property Element Usage
XAML Values
*zeroOrMoreConditions*
Zero or more <xref:System.Windows.Condition> objects.

In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> is bound to `Places`, an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> of `Place` objects.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>绑定到`Places`、<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>的`Place`对象。

trans-unit.source: `Place` objects have properties `Name` and `State`.
The definition of `Place` and `Places` are not shown.
Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> displays a `Place` object.
The <xref:System.Windows.Style> in the example is applied to each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Condition> elements of the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> specify that if the `Name` and `State` of the `Place` data item are `Portland` and `OR` respectively, then the background of corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> is set to `Cyan`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Condition>元素<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>指定，如果`Name`和`State`的`Place`数据项是`Portland`和`OR`分别然后后台相应<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>设置到`Cyan`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Setter" /> objects that describe the property values to apply when all the conditions of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger" /> are met.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Setter" /> 对象的集合，这些对象描述在满足 <see cref="T:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger" /> 的所有条件时应用的属性值。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Setter" /> objects.
The default value is an empty collection.

<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> enables you to start actions by using the <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A> properties, or to set property values by using <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects when the bound data meet a set of conditions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> 使您能够通过使用启动操作<xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A>属性，或通过设置属性值<xref:System.Windows.Setter>对象时绑定的数据满足一组条件。

trans-unit.source: If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects in the same or different setter collections setting the same property, the <xref:System.Windows.Setter> that is declared last is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果有两个<xref:System.Windows.Setter>设置相同的属性中，相同或不同 setter 集合中的对象<xref:System.Windows.Setter>，它是使用声明上一次。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> child to a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.Windows.Setter>子级到<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>对象隐式将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection>为<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects are not supported; only <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> supports <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects.
XAML Property Element Usage
XAML Values
*zeroOrMoreSetters*
Zero or more <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects.

In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> is bound to `Places`, an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> of `Place` objects.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>绑定到`Places`、<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>的`Place`对象。

trans-unit.source: `Place` objects have properties `Name` and `State`.
The definition of `Place` and `Places` are not shown.
Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> displays a `Place` object.
The <xref:System.Windows.Style> in the example is applied to each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Condition> elements of the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> specify that if the `Name` and `State` of the `Place` data item are `Portland` and `OR` respectively, then the background of corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> is set to `Cyan`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Condition>元素<xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>指定，如果`Name`和`State`的`Place`数据项是`Portland`和`OR`分别然后后台相应<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>设置到`Cyan`。

trans-unit.source: Note that `<MultiDataTrigger.Setters>` is implicit.
The child object to add.
Adds a child object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的文本内容添加到对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> 接口时使用。
